titles.title: 530 No Not Despairingly Come I To Thee (easy nice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No not despairingly
Come I to Thee
No not distrustingly
Bend I the kneee
Sin hath gone over me
Yet is this still my plea
Yet is this still my plea
Jesus hath died

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ah mine iniquity
Crimson hath been
Infinite infinite
Sin upon sin
Sin of not loveing Thee
Sin of not trusting Thee
Sin of not trusting Thee
Infinite sin

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord I confess to Thee
Sadly my sin
All I am tell I Thee
All I have been
Purge Thou my sin away
Wash Thou my soul this day
Wash Thou my soul this day
Lord make me clean

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Faithful and just art Thou
Forgiving all
Loving and kind art Thou
When sinners call
Lord let the cleansing blood
Blood of the Lamb of God
Blood of the Lamb of God
Pass o'er my soul

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Then all is peace and light
This soul within
Thus shall I walk with Thee
The loved Unseen
Leaning on Thee my God
Guided along the road
Guided along the road
Nothing between
